amendment.description: Amendment deletes language earmarking $60 million of Emergency Management Planning and Assistance funding for a windstorm simulation center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the funds appropriated in the bill for Emergency Management Planning and Assistance by $60 million for plannng and construction costs of a full-scale windstorm simulation center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stokes amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 187 (Roll no. 277).
